Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.24412629]Newcastle disease virus(NDV):inhibition of viral infection in chicken embryo fibroblasts(IC50=52.9 ± 0.9 μmol/L);Marek's disease virus(MDV):inhibition of viral infection in chicken embryo fibroblasts(IC50=37.5 ± 1.2 μmol/L).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: peptides from the hydrophobic fusogenic domains of gB and gH can block virus entry, disrupt cellular membranes by interacting with the cellular factors, or play a role in the glycoprotein conformational changes

Literature.Title: In vitro and in vivo broad antiviral activity of peptides homologous to fusion glycoproteins of Newcastle disease virus and Marek's disease virus.
Literature.Author: Chi XJ, Wang XJ, Wang CY, Cui XJ, Wang XJ.
